/>
Introduction
This topic contains general information about scheduling examinations, including
general information on scheduling examinations
examinations for Department of Veterans Affairs (VA)-employee claimants
exceptions for employees who work at an examining facility
scheduling examinations for conditions subject to temporary or episodic improvement
, and
scheduling specialist examinations
.
title: M21-1, Part IV, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section B - Scheduling Examinations
citation: Part IV, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section B
